SEARCH
Package core

Class Layer

java.lang.Object
core.Layer
public class Layer extends Object
A Layer is one rectangular shape in the drawing program. All drawings are composed of layers Each layer has: - a color - an opacity value - a blend mode (how it mixes with lower layers) - dimensions for width and height Layers can be moved, resized using corner handles, and drawn with visual resize handles for user interaction.

    Represents which resize handle a user is interacting with.

  • Constructor Details

    • Layer

      public Layer(Color color, float opacity, BlendMode blendMode, Rectangle shape)
      Creates a new layer with the given color, opacity, blend mode, and rectangular position/size.
      Parameters:
      color - the layer's fill color
      opacity - the transparency level (0.0 = transparent, 1.0 = opaque)
      blendMode - how this layer blends with lower layers
      shape - the rectangle defining the layer's position and size

  • Method Details

    • move

      public void move(int dx, int dy)
      Moves the entire layer by the specified horizontal and vertical offset.
      Parameters:
      dx - how far to move the layer horizontally
      dy - how far to move the layer vertically

    • resize

      public void resize(Layer.HandlePosition handle, int dx, int dy)
      Resizes the layer based on which corner handle is being dragged. The rectangle grows or shrinks according to the drag direction. Width and height are prevented from becoming too small or inverted.
      Parameters:
      handle - the handle being dragged
      dx - how far the mouse moved horizontally
      dy - how far the mouse moved vertically

    • getHandleAt

      public Layer.HandlePosition getHandleAt(Point p)
      Determines whether the given point lies on any of the resize handles.
      Parameters:
      p - the point to check
      Returns:
      which handle the point touches, or NONE if it touches none

    • getColor

      public Color getColor()
      Returns:
      the fill color of the layer

    • getOpacity

      public float getOpacity()
      Returns:
      the opacity of the layer (0.0 to 1.0)

    • getBlendMode

      public BlendMode getBlendMode()
      Returns:
      the blend mode used when compositing this layer

    • getShape

      public Rectangle getShape()
      Returns:
      the rectangle that defines the layer's position and size

    • drawHandles

      public void drawHandles(Graphics2D g2d)
      Draws small black squares at the four corners of the layer. These handles allow the user to see where they can click to resize.
      Parameters:
      g2d - the graphics context to draw into
